lines.text: Zoom and enhance! Maybe the fire burned an image of the dead guy's reflection into the robes, and we can find out that way!
No, I-I mean... what do you mean ''zoom and enhance''?
Y'know, with that big microscope! Take a closer look, see if the... photons... left a, residual... something!
That's... really not how it works.
Fire wouldn't... capture an image of... you couldn't just... why would you think...?
Sheesh. What's even the point of forensics?
